summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account for the period of July 1, 2014, to July 31, 2014. It details significant incoming and outgoing transfers, including a large deposit from Elysium Management and various withdrawals. The document highlights the account's ending balance and interest earned during the period.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Incoming Transfer
events.description: A significant incoming transfer of $20,000,000.00 from Elysium Management.

events.title: Outgoing Transfers
events.description: Multiple outgoing transfers totaling $825,000.00 and $250,000.00 to various entities.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer
events.description: An outgoing transfer of $39,175.00 to a law firm.

events.title: Interest Payment
events.description: An interest payment of $8,642.69 was credited to the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St. Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $549,563,268.67 as of July 1, 2014.
The account received a large deposit of $20,000,000.00 from Elysium Management on July 15, 2014.
The account experienced various outgoing transfers totaling $1,114,175.00 during the month.
The ending balance of the account as of July 31, 2014, was $69,257,736.36.
Interest earned during the period was $8,642.69.
